description: Lists all the roots, organizational units (OUs), and accounts that the specified policy is attached to. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy whose attachments you want to know. The regex pattern for a policy ID string requires 'p-' followed by from 8 to 128 lowercase or uppercase letters, digits, or the underscore character (_).

nested_items.name: Targets
nested_items.description: A list of structures, each of which contains details about one of the entities to which the specified policy is attached.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy target.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy target.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the policy target.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the policy target.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null.
